title: 239: Chris Harrison Suing "The Bachelor” + Calling Out David Dobrik + More News
itunes:title: 239: Chris Harrison Suing "The Bachelor” + Calling Out David Dobrik + More News
description:
(TRIGGER WARNING: S*xual Assault - today’s episode contains details of a sexual assault case) The Broads are back and chatting current Bachelor News: Chris Harrison potentially suing ABC’s The Bachelor, Matt James’ messages on Instagram, Rachael Kirkconnell’s mother’s Facebook group, Kelly’s tea on Peter, Bennett’s current instagram creepiness, and more. They then discuss in detail the current allegations surrounding David Dobrik and the Vlog Squad and the survivors who are speaking out. ***NOTE: Since recording more has come out regarding the Vlog Squad/David Dobrik has issued a second apology - The Broads will discuss all of this next week.
RESOURCES:Stop AANHPI Hate Resources (including education resources, allyship resources, ways to donate, etc): https://anti-asianviolenceresources.carrd.co/
National Resources for S*xual Assault Survivors: https://www.rainn.org/national-resources-sexual-assault-survivors-and-their-loved-ones

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS: ***FLEX FIT: Go to FLEXFITS.COM/CHATTY and use code CHATTY for 20% off Flex Disc Starter Kits - or 10% off your first Flex CDup - PLUS free US shipping! ***STAMPS.COM: Get a special offer that includes a 4 week trial PLUS free postage and a digital scale at STAMPS.COM, click on the microphone at the top of the homepage and type in CHATTY***MEJURI: Visit MEJURI.COM / CHATTY for 10% off your order***PLUSH CARE: Go to PLUSHCARE.COM/CHATTY to start your FREE 30-day trial

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
